transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Good morning, ma'am. Priyam baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Haan ji, haan ji, bataiye.
Executive: Haan ma'am, hamari baat hui thi us din woh uske baad aapne catalog vagarah kuch kaam kiya tha?
Customer: Haan, maine thoda bahut update kiya hai. Actually, main shaadi mein aayi hu toh main thodi si busy hui thi. Waise maine kaam kiya aa rahi hai lead. Ek lead aayi hui thi toh woh keh raha tha ki ma'am aapke paas bahut late lead gayi hai. Maine toh kaam bhi karwa liya.
Executive: Kis type ki lead hai?
Customer: Haan, woh client se baat hui thi. Usne bola tha ki ma'am humne kaam bhi karwa liya. Aapke paas bahut late lead gayi hai. Aur jabki woh lead matlab main pehle hi aayi thi usme. Agar chalo koi baat karu.
Executive: Kahan par matlab yeh portal par dikhi thi ya mail par aayi thi woh?
Customer: Nahi nahi portal pe hi aayi. Portal pe call karke maine uthai thi woh utility ka hi tha woh lead. Car parking shed vagarah matlab Delhi ka ek baar call karke.
Executive: Achcha. Toh yaar kabhi kabhi kuch bhi bahut saare issues hote hai. Lead hamare paas late aa paati hai. Network issue ho jata hai. Jo bhi issue ho jata hai. Aapne unko bola tha ki kab requirement post kari thi?
Customer: Haan, usne bola maine 15 din pehle hi ki hui thi aur mera kaam bhi ho raha hai. Aapke paas lead late gayi hui hai. Toh chalo koi issue nahi hai. Agar next time hoga toh dekh lenge.
Executive: Theek hai, usko ek baar dekh lenge. Aur baaki leads matlab lead wali aisa keh rahe the ki nahi mil rahi hai woh wali.
Customer: Woh wali lead aa toh rahi hai lekin size chhoti hai. Jaise ki aap dekh rahe ho Chennai ka aa raha hai. Ab Chennai mein hum itni door ka hai. Chhota size hum work nahi kar sakte. 400 square feet pe hum work nahi kar sakte hai. Ek yeh bhi issue hai aapka usme. Tamil Nadu ka hai. Uska bhi kal ek aluminium ka main dekh rahi thi.
Customer: Aluminium ka aaya hua tha but uska jo tha na woh rent pe chahiye hoga unhe. Usme mention nahi tha rent. Unhone woh lead utha li. Ab usme toh hamara call hi waste waste ho raha hai na. Ab jaise usually 17 call aapke aa rakha hai. Main daily ke daily main chaar paanch utha rahi toh waste hi ho raha hai. Unko rent pe mention nahi hai. Ya kisi ko call karo toh uska issue hai. Abhi theek hai abhi main thoda handle kar du na. Aata hai issue toh main aapko batati hu.
Executive: Yeh wali lead aur aap le rahe ho jaise pagoda tent hai toh yeh yeh kis use mein hai yeh bata do aap.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Pagoda tent. Toh is keyword hamare bhi add nahi hai. Isko canvas se matlab kya alag se kuch bolte hai isko?
Customer: Nahi nahi isko pagoda tent hi bolte hai. Tent side mein hi yeh aata hai. Jaise canopy type mein hota hai na. Toh pagoda tent hamara jo rehta hai woh standard size hai. Ki hum usko seedha sales kar sakte hai.
Executive: Toh yeh hamara bana rahe hai kyunki hamare paas stock rehta hai yeh.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Jaise aapne event vagarah ke time dekha hoga. Kahin pe use ho jata hai yeh. Jaise abhi aapka yahan chal raha hai. Prayagraj side mein aapka yeh Kumbh Mela chalega abhi January mein. Toh yahan pe kya hai ki woh rehne ke liye ya event ke liye aapka ho gaya ya promotions vagarah kisi ko karne ke liye stall vagarah lagane ke liye. Chai ka stall vagarah kuch laga lete hai.
Executive: Achcha achcha. Toh yeh aapne chhota hi rehta hai 10 by 10 ka.
Executive: Alag se search karke consume kiya tha jaise jaise mili thi yeh leads?
Customer: Abhi mere se yeh lead ek bhi nahi aayi aapke pagoda tent ki toh. Ek aayi thi kal ka hai. Kal bhi aaya hua tha maine I think Saharanpur ka hai. 500 pagoda tent ka hai. Haan, maine woh uthai but maine unko contact bhi kiya toh koi response aaya nahi hai abhi.
Executive: Response non-contactable the?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Achcha. Koi response nahi aaya aur usme tha bhi aapka ki 70% woh hai chance ki aapke lead utha sakte ho. But koi response nahi aaya client ke wahan se. Client quality nahi tha.
Executive: Canvas pagoda tent rental services.
Customer: Haan haan woh bhi tha lekin woh flag ka chahiye unko. Flag jo hai na aapne dekha hoga orange color ka flag hai mention. Toh woh keh rahe the ki mujhe aisa flag design ka chahiye but hum flag based out nahi karte.
Executive: Theek hai. Chalo inko main ek baar dekh leta hu. Yeh steel steel bench bhi banate ho aap log?
Customer: Haan, bench ke liye bhi maine dekha tha ki main ek baar bench ke liye calling karne kyunki hamare steel work hota hai toh usme agar bench chahiye toh humne bench ke liye bhi kiya hua hai.
Executive: Achcha bench ka koi keyword add nahi hai hamare mein. Theek hai aap ek kaam kijiye jab aap yahan se free hoke aa jayiyega toh ek baar kar lijiye toh yeh jo baaki cheeze extra kami reh gayi improve hone ke liye woh hum kar lete hai. Jaise bench ka keyword hai ya pagoda tent keyword hai yeh koi add nahi hai hamare mein toh aap mujhe bata dijiyega toh woh add kar denge isme theek hai. Baaki ek cheez aur yaad kijiye maine aapko bataya tha na jaise last time ek woh concern ho gaya tha toh kuch uske liye documents chahiye the woh maine sir ko bhi bhej rakhe hai agar sir bhej de toh theek hai otherwise aap unse woh karke mujhe bhej dijiye.
Customer: I think sir jo hai na Chandigarh side hai. Toh woh free hoke hi aapko maine unse bhi baat ki thi toh unhone bola main Chandigarh hi aaya hua hu. Toh pata nahi Chandigarh mein koi family family bhi rehti hogi unke paas.
Executive: Achcha aap kab se working kar rahe ho matlab aaj working ho aap ki nahi ho?
Customer: Nahi mera jaise hota hai main zyada tar work from home hi karti hu. Office toh main bahut kam hi jaati hu. Theek hai. But yeh hai ki main daily base pe kaam karti hu. Aisa nahi hai ki maine chhod diya. Aisa kuch nahi hai. Aapke daily base pe aapko response vagarah bhi bhej paungi toh main bata sakti hu aapko saari cheeze.
Executive: Theek hai toh main aapko WhatsApp kar deta hu. Aap ek baar unse agar coordinate ho jaye toh coordinate karke mujhe woh documents vagarah bhej dijiye theek hai.
Customer: Okay okay theek hai. Ab mujhe bhej dijiyega main ek baar baat kar leti hu.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Late buyleads; client already completed work.

- Small size leads, not suitable for business.

- Leads requiring rental options, not specified.

- Pagoda tent leads not generating.

- Requires flag design, which they don't offer.



Resolution:

- Executive acknowledged the issues with late leads.

- Executive noted the size and rental specification issues.

- Executive confirmed bench keyword not added.

- Executive requested pending documents for a previous concern.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will WhatsApp to coordinate documents.

- Customer will contact regarding pending documents.

- Customer will inform about missing keywords.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, pagoda tent, keywords, documents, size
